name: Extreme Blast
description:
Note - Highscores only work on the windows verson... Controls
  • Movement
    • W to move forwards
    • A to move left
    • S to move backwards
    • D to move right
    • Esc to pause
  • Aiming and Firing
    • Use the mouse to aim. The white triangle always points in the direction of your shot. I highly recommend using a mouse, as it makes the game much more fun.
    • Left click to fire.
